Sentencas: Two pellets of yttria-stabilised zirconia in contact were heated to temperatures between 600 and 1000degreesC and the contact resistance over the interface was measured as a function of temperature and mechanical load.
Titulo: Load induced changes in the contact resistance across an YSZ interface

Sentencas: The contact resistance decreased with increasing temperature, and the apparent activation energy was found to be higher during heating of a contact than during the subsequent cooling.
Titulo: Load induced changes in the contact resistance across an YSZ interface

Sentencas: Increasing the mechanical load on the contacts (at fixed temperature) resulted in a decrease of the contact resistance.
Titulo: Load induced changes in the contact resistance across an YSZ interface

Sentencas: The behaviour could be well fitted by a power law.
Titulo: Load induced changes in the contact resistance across an YSZ interface

Sentencas: The results obtained for the zirconia contacts are compared to similar experiments performed on an electronically conducting ceramic.
Titulo: Load induced changes in the contact resistance across an YSZ interface
